enterCredentials: Enter your credentials to access your dashboard.
joinToStart: Join to start tracking your trades and improving your strategy.
welcomeDescription: Let's get you set up to track and analyze your trades.
stepOneDescription: Go to settings to add your first broker or crypto exchange account. You need at least one to log trades.
stepTwoDescription: Manually add your trades using the 'Add Trade' button or use the 'Import' feature to upload a CSV from your broker.
stepThreeDescription: Use the dashboard and AI insights to review your performance, find patterns, and refine your strategy.
kpiDescription: Your key trading metrics. Use the dropdown to filter by account.
equityCurveDescription: Your portfolio value over time (based on closed trades).
equityCurvePlaceholder: Your equity curve will appear here once you log a closed trade.
getPersonalizedSuggestions: Get personalized suggestions to improve your trading strategy based on your history.
aiAnalysisDescription: Based on your logged trades, our AI can analyze your patterns, identify potential strengths and weaknesses, and offer actionable advice to help you refine your approach and make more informed decisions.
logTradesForSuggestions: Please log some trades before requesting suggestions.
failedToGenerateSuggestions: Failed to generate suggestions. Please try again.
aiSuggestionsBasedOnHistory: Here are some AI-generated suggestions based on your trading history.
tradeHistoryDescription: A log of all your past and open trades.
deleteTradeWarning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the trade for {{instrument}} from the {{account}} account.
updateTradeDetails: Update the details of your trade.
enterTradeDetails: Enter the details of your trade. Click save when you're done.
quantityPositive: Quantity must be a positive number.
exitDateError: Exit date cannot be before entry date.
whyTrade: Why did you take this trade?
importDescription: Select your account and upload the trade history file (must be a CSV). The AI will attempt to parse it automatically.
importProcessing: Your file is being processed by the AI. This may take a moment.
importError: The AI could not process your CSV file. Please check the format and try again.
importNoTrades: The AI was unable to find any valid trades in the provided file.
styleDistributionDescription: Breakdown of your trades by style.
styleDistributionPlaceholder: Log some trades to see your style distribution.
accountSettingsDescription: Manage your accounts, starting balances, and other optional details.
accountExists: An account with this name already exists.
contactDeveloperDescription: For questions, support, or feedback, please reach out.
securityDescription: Manage your security settings, including passkeys.
passkeyRegisteredSuccess: You can now use your passkey to sign in.
authCancelled: Authentication was cancelled by the user.
registerPasskeyDescription: Secure your account and sign in with your face, fingerprint, or PIN. It's faster and more secure than a password.
passkeyReady: Your passkey is all set. You can now use it to sign in on this device.
monthlyPLDescription: Your net profit and loss for each month.
monthlyPLPlaceholder: Log some closed trades to see your monthly performance.
advancedAnalyticsDescription: Take a deeper dive into your trading data.
performanceByDayDescription: Your net P/L for each day of the week.
weekdayPLPlaceholder: Log some closed trades to see your performance by weekday.
instrumentPLPlaceholder: Log some closed trades to see your performance by instrument.
tradeNotFoundDescription: The trade you are looking for could not be found.
accountTransactionsDescription: Log deposits and withdrawals to keep your account balance accurate.
amountRequired: Amount is required and must be positive.
